name: UFO-Radar
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

  • Destroy all UFOs by adjusting ANGLE and DISTANCE on the radar system.
  • You can adjust ANGLE and DISTANCE by clicking the - and + button, or just adjust them by dragging the indicator.
  • Save ENERGY  as much as you can, longer distance costs more ENERGY.

GAME LOSE:

  • If UFO escaped.
  • If UFO occupied the laucher.
  • Run out of ENERGY.

GAME WIN:

  • Destroy all 10 UFOs.
